entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump What’s all this liar? You got on stage last night screaming to your deplorables that Coronavirus was fake made up by Democrats. Yet today (sounding like you have it 🖕) get in front of cameras saying it’s real and trying to talk about Afghanistan with some word salad thrown in.
